name: tracker
description: An app that allows you to keep track of something (IE: miles, chant, yoga, etc)

scripts.prod: concurrently "cd backend; npm start" "cd client; serve -s build -p 3000"
scripts.secure:prod: concurrently "cd backend; npm start" "cd client; export HTTPS=true&&SSL_CRT_FILE=cert.pem&&SSL_KEY_FILE=keytmp.pem serve -s build -p 3000"
